items.title: Operational Product Manager
description: Promoted to this role after consistently contributing to both technical and operational work within the team.
Led 14-day sprint cycles by running sprint planning, backlog refinement, retrospectives, and daily stand-ups to keep projects moving smoothly.
Kept track of timelines, tasks, and cross-team dependencies to make sure work stayed on schedule across different projects.
Helped remove blockers by coordinating with developers, designers, and stakeholders whenever issues came up during sprints.
Built and maintained GoHighLevel automations and integrations to improve lead handling, internal workflows, and client-facing processes.
Developed internal tools and small web applications to reduce manual work and improve data accuracy for daily operations.

items.title: Web & SEO Specialist
description: Worked on both on-page and off-page SEO, including keyword research, technical checks, and content updates to improve search visibility.
Built and updated websites using tools like Next.js, Webflow, WordPress, and GoHighLevel, focusing on performance and responsiveness.
Improved site layout, navigation, and accessibility to make pages easier to use and more conversion-friendly.
Set up funnels, automations, and CRM workflows in GoHighLevel to support marketing campaigns and lead follow-ups.

items.title: Web Developer
description: Built responsive and animated web pages using Next.js, following SEO and performance best practices.
Handled website maintenance, updates, and technical checks, including sitemap setup and page structure improvements.
Managed basic server setup and deployment tasks to publish updates and keep sites running smoothly.

items.title: Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology
items.location: Mindanao State University – Iligan Institute of Technology
description: Specialized in Database Systems, focusing on data modeling, system design, and database management concepts.
Graduated Summa Cum Laude after consistently strong academic performance.
Completed a thesis project called “KultuArte,” a web application designed to help promote local culture and arts in Iligan City.
Built several academic and personal projects, including a medicine tracking system, a culture-focused social platform, and an app integrated with machine learning for rice classification.

items.title: Freelance Developer (Part-time)
description: Developed a POS and inventory system to help small businesses manage sales and track stock more easily.
Built an IoT-based attendance system with automated logging and simple dashboards for viewing records.
Created custom websites based on client needs, focusing on clean design, responsiveness, and performance.
Worked closely with clients to gather requirements, give progress updates, and make sure the final product met their expectations.
